summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Center; ratifying and confirming preparation of plans, specifications, cost estimates and execution of a contract for construction of the Seattle Center covered walkways; authorizing the preparation of plans, specifications, cost estimates and awarding of a contract for the alteration of the Seattle Center Armory Building (Phase I - Part II), and authorizing the Superintendent of Buildings to proceed with said improvements under the direction of the Board of Public Works.
